title: Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 AIO 12in1 en-US OEM ESD Apr2014
description:
Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 x86 x64 12in1 en-US OEM ESD Apr2014


[ RELEASE INFO ]

  File:		Win7.X86.X64.ESD.en-US.Apr2014.iso

  Sources:	32bit: X17-59463
		64bit: X17-59465 
		
		
  Size: 	3,94GB
  Format: 	Bootable ISO
   
  CRC32: 	a435c2b1
  MD5:		a0bd16bd8d65b38d1d7548142ddadfd8
  SHA-1: 	7890bbbe5294301b82871bd3f03ac4334767fad7

   
[ CONTENTS ]

  * USB3, Sata and Network drivers added.

  Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

  * .NET Framework 4.5.1
  * Internet Explorer 11
  * Hotfixes - 2014-04-08

  Setupcomplete / Post-install:

  * KB890930
  * Defender Updates


[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

  32bit:
  * Windows 7 Home Premium 
  * Windows 7 Professional 
  * Windows 7 Ultimate
  * Windows 7 Home Premium		Activation by OEM 
  * Windows 7 Professional		Activation by OEM 
  * Windows 7 Ultimate			Activation by OEM
  
  64bit:  
  * Windows 7 Home Premium 
  * Windows 7 Professional 
  * Windows 7 Ultimate
  * Windows 7 Home Premium		Activation by OEM 
  * Windows 7 Professional		Activation by OEM 
  * Windows 7 Ultimate			Activation by OEM


[ FEATURES ]
  
  * install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)
    

[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

  * Only clean installs can be made with this format, not upgrades. 

  Activation & application information:
  * A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.
  * All optional applications except 7-Zip and WinRAR uses web installers
    which requires connection to internet.
  * To skip activation and optional applications, just click on "Exit".   
  * To Pre-Activate Windows, select "Activation".
  * Choose any application. 
  * Click on "Begin Install" to execute your choices.


  Optional software:

  * Google Chrome
  * Mozilla Firefox
  * Opera Chromium
  * 7-zip 9.25
  * Adobe Reader
  * Adobe Flashplayer
  * DirectX
  * MSE
  * WinRAR 5.10 

    
[ Installation ]

  * Create bootable USB (highly recommended), minimum 8GB, with Rufus (attached) 
    or burn to DVD at slow speed.
 

  Hope you will enjoy this release!

  Regards,
  Generation2
